Desc.eng: A good day to you! Could you help out a poor man in need?
You know what? First I want to ask you something. Why are you begging in the most dangerous, monster-infested neighborhood? Why?
A good question indeed, but the answer is will cost you 100 Gold. It’s one of our sacred trade secrets, you know.
Please tell me that you are not willing to pay this man.
Of course I’m not paying him. This is ridiculous.
Why not, Katarina? I’m honestly interested in what he has to say. So, why are you begging here?
The secret is, sir, that there are simply too many gullible people fleeing through here who fall for this line. HEHEHE...
Ha! It served you right, Van Helsing!
